website_summaries.verdict: A thick sleeping bag that is comfortable and cute.
pros: Very warm and comfortable, but not too hot
Cute moose pattern in either blue or pink
Rolls up to a nice small size
Can handle a lot of use
Double-sided zipper pulls make it easy for kids to zip on their own
cons: The zipper can sometimes have problems

customer_reviews.title: My daughter does love the bag and it still kept her warm despite ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 3-year old daughter for a camping trip the weekend of June 24th. The zipper broke on the first night. Since I ordered it over a month (May 18th) in advance to prepare for the trip, I cannot return/replace through Amazon. I have contacted the company to inquire on the warranty and will update my review to 5-stars if they will replace. My daughter does love the bag and it still kept her warm despite the broken zipper, but I am pretty bummed that it broke so easily. It was not stuck on anything and literally just popped off.
customer_reviews.author: unixchick

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my 5yo so she has A LOT of room to grow into it. I'm 5'9 and I bet I could get in it. It is VERY thick. Seems it would be great for camping in cold weather. We've only used it at home to play so far. So far I am very impressed with the zippers. They have double sided pulls, so you can zip from the outside or if your arms are inside, you can open that way too. And they have yet to pull in any of the fabric or get stuck! Very good zippers. Seems overall great quality.
customer_reviews.author: MW26

customer_reviews.title: This sleeping bag is perfect! It does not feel like cheap plastic like ...
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping bag is perfect! It does not feel like cheap plastic like some sleeping bags do. I got this for my 4 year old daughter as she likes to sleep on a pallet in my room. She doesn't have any trouble with the zipper and it does not get caught on the fabric. I thought she might get cold since the inside material is the same as the outside, not flannel but she says its warm and cozy. It's great that it can unzip by the feet as my son likes to sleep in the opposite end. I just ordered him his own since he loves it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey B.

customer_reviews.title: Best child's sleeping bad!
customer_reviews.text: My son and daughter both asked for sleeping bags for Christmas, ages 7 and 3. After lots and lots of searching I found that these ones were by far the best for my money. They are very good quality. The material feels great and is very soft. The moose print is also adorable. I love that these sleepings bags work for both indoor and outdoor use. Overall I would highly recommend these sleeping bags above any other. You don't need to spend $40 on child's sleeping bag. This one right here is everything you could ask for and more.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: This looks good although I don't wan't to take the bags out ...
customer_reviews.text: This looks good although I don't wan't to take the bags out yet before the grandkids come. I agree with someone who said not to print "boys sleeping bag" since blue doesn't mean that girls won't be happy with it.....I ordered it for two girls. Also I don't like the chemical warning along with the boys sleeping bag in print where you cannot remove it. I will try to cover it with tape. The bag seems to fill the bill so I will ignore the case it goes into.
customer_reviews.author: elainejoy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cozy
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping bag is very light weight and warm. My kids like to play sleep over and sleep in their sleeping bags on the hardwood floor in the winter. I was concerned it wouldn't be enough cushion but they were fine and love them. The quality is good but it took me 3 times to figure out how to use the storage strap. You have to fold the sleeping bag in half, then roll up to use both straps. Also, the zipper has not gotten stuck which is a complaint on other sleeping bags. The sleeping bag looks exactly like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Franniegirl

customer_reviews.title: Great for small children up to medium sized adults
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 4 year old and were surprised at how big it actually is. Laid out flat, it covers the majority of a twin sized mattress and when unzipped, can pretty much double as a twin comforter. It does keep our kiddo fairly warm too, I'd be comfortable letting him sleep in it in 40° weather without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: TXJaxon

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put back into bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that fits my 7 year old very well. She absolutely loves it and says its really snuggly. The only issue i have is that it takes a long time to wrap it up and put it back into the little bag that it comes with. My daughter kept trying and trying and she couldn't get it inside. I finally had to do it for her. It would be easier for Moms if the kids are able to put it back in the bag. There are no other issues and my daughters favorite color is BLUE! Its a nice bright color
customer_reviews.author: RoseS

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Have only used it in and about the house, but it is one of my 3 year old granddaughters articles she has to have when watching a movie. In July we will be using it while camping in the Upper Peninsula of Michigan, and I will update more. So far, I like the quality of the sleeping bag, and the size is generous for my 3 year old granddaughter, so she will be in it for awhile and that is great!!!
customer_reviews.author: JLC

customer_reviews.title: The zipper came unattached very easily.
customer_reviews.text: When we received this I was pleased and thought it looks exactly like the pic. My daughter was excited to use it for her sleep over. Well, after that one sleep over the zipper came off fairly easy. I was disappointed with that end of it, so that is why I gave this fewer than 5 stars. I think the quality could be a little better and more durable for the price. I read that most buyers have been pleased and this has lasted through some camping trips, which is great, but for us it could have been better.
customer_reviews.author: Surah130

customer_reviews.title: We Bought Four, and We Have Enjoyed Them!
customer_reviews.text: We bought four of these for Christmas gifts for our littles, in both pink and blue. They were super excited to open these and use them Christmas Eve,and they use them for regular "sleepovers" and "camping" in our house. The pattern is cute and will grow with them, the zippers work, the elastic storage bands are good, and they actually go back in their carrying bags without a major struggle. I would buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: C. Hall

customer_reviews.title: They've been through quite a lot and still look as good as they did when they were purchased
customer_reviews.text: I've had two of these sleeping bags that I bought for my daughters almost two years. They've exceeded my expectations. They've used them for both overnight camping and for sleepovers at friend's house. They've been through quite a lot and still look as good as they did when they were purchased. The zippers are still great and work fine.
customer_reviews.author: SME

customer_reviews.title: They work great for indoors
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these (pink and blue) for my kids ages 2 and 4 for when we stay at our in laws. They work great for indoors, my kids like them. The zippers snag every once in a while, but no rips yet. They are not intended for outdoor use, but we took these tent camping with us and nighttime temps reached down to the 50's. The kids stayed warm and stayed asleep all night (meanwhile my husband and I were freezing under our thin quilt, darn Michigan summers!)
customer_reviews.author: Karah127

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute & Warm!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 5 year old and our first family camping trip. It's super cute and most importanlty it kept our 5 yr old nice and warm all night ( 50 degree weather). Seams in tact, zipper good quality. Overall great quality. Used it once and it held up for the 4 day camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: Ton Ton

customer_reviews.title: Well made sleeping bag for toddlers an older boys
customer_reviews.text: I bought the sleeping bags for my three-year-old and my five-year-old Grandsons. The moose pattern on them is really cute. They love burrowing into them. Since they are still small there is plenty of room for them to grow. I do find it due to the slippery material that sometimes they slide out of the sleeping bag. That is the only negative part to this bag. Other than that the quality is very good and the boys love them!
customer_reviews.author: yolie

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfy, quality sleeping bags!
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased three of these for our girls and we have really liked them! We have only used them for camping once but they worked great! Super cute, comfy and fits easily back in the sack. I feel like they are definitely great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and warm
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for each of my daughters and they absolutely loved them. These sleeping bags kept them warm on our camping trip and the kids keep using them in their rooms throughout summer. The sleeping bags fit in our washer and dryer just fine. I just put one in at a time and use cold water and a cooler setting on my dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Tirado Family

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sleeping bag. Bought it for my two year old for our camper. Although we were testing it out on the couch and it kept me toasty warm and I could fit inside at 5’3”. She will have this one for a long time, and we looked at the same one in the store for another $5.00 so the savings are nice.
customer_reviews.author: OurFamily

customer_reviews.title: ... year old son (in blue for him) and I love them. The material is great and it's pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two 1 for my 6 year old daughter and 1 for my 5 year old son (in blue for him) and I love them. The material is great and it's pretty thick. My kids has so much room that it will last them for years before they out grow the sleeping bags. After use it was really easy rolling it up and placing them back in the bag it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thin but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I got this sleeping bag for my 3 year old daughter for our summer camping trips. We haven't used it yet but it seems well made and is soft. It also rolls up and fits into the bag nicely. She should be able to fit in it for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this and I loved the price. The only thing that would have made it better is if there was more fabric at the top for her head. In order for her head not to be on the ground she had to bury herself deep inside the sleeping bag, which works for now because she’s so small.
customer_reviews.author: L.A.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not durable.
customer_reviews.text: These sleeping bags are adorable. My children loved them. The fabric is not great. There are multiple pulls/runs in the fabric after my boys used them at their cousins (indoor on carpet) for one night! I don't know how the thing fabric would hold up outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: As far as I can tell it's a nice purchase especially for the price I was so happy ...
customer_reviews.text: As far as I can tell it's a nice purchase especially for the price I was so happy to find one last min I got it for my granddaughter needed for a sleep over. It's cute goes Perfect with the everything else pi picked up
customer_reviews.author: CANDY

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping beauty
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love her new sleeping bag! She is 5 and has sleepovers with her cousins who have sleeping bags and now she has her very own. The style is adorable and soft. We haven't taken this bag camping or outdoors but definitely works well for what we need.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: I recommend.
customer_reviews.text: It keep my little guy warm in low 40’s. It’s nice and thick. I wish the material inside was not the slick sort but warmer to the touch but yea, we like it. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Dawnice Murray

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke pretty instantly.
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke pretty instantly.... kinds wish I would have sent it back asap...but let my daughter take it to her winter camp with her school and put it in a closet when she came back...smh
customer_reviews.author: Robert Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Works for sleepovers.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has used this sleeping bag for two sleepovers and says it is very comfortable. She says she's never too warm. We have not tested it for camping yet.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: I have been pretty disappointed in this bag
customer_reviews.text: I have been pretty disappointed in this bag. I bought it for my only daughter, and she loves it. Sadly after only 1 year, and very low use, the zipper has already started to separate from the bag. I should have gone with the coleman one.
customer_reviews.author: katbc

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS LIKE THE HOT SAUCE THAT WAS BROKEN IN THE BOX!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS WAS TO BE A SPECIAL GIFT FOR this weekend - this sleeping bag wrapping was torn by the broken glass and now smells like hot sauce!!! NOT GOOD FOR A 2 YEAR OLD! Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SANDY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for family camping trips
customer_reviews.text: I got this sleeping bag for my 4 year old son and he loves it. I got it for family camping trips. It's definitely too warm for daycare naptime so I wouldn't recommend it for that. It's very thick. Definitely for kids only. Adults can fit length wise but width wise it would be too tight for an adult.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm. Definitely made with good quality material.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves, it’s great for kids, will fit him into adult years as long as he doesn’t go past 6 ft. Very warm! Used it for camping when it dipped down into the 50s overnight and no extra blankets were needed.
customer_reviews.author: Prime lover

customer_reviews.title: Good little bag
customer_reviews.text: So I haven't had a new sleeping bag in a couple years so it was time to upgrade... For the price this bag is worth it... It keeps me pretty warm at night in the tent... I'm 5'7" and I fit in this bag well... If you're any taller than that this bag would not fit you well...
customer_reviews.author: Eryn

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and well made!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this sleeping bag, which I ordered for my three year old daughter to have for sleep overs and summer vacations. It comes in a very nice matching nylon draw string bag. The sleeping bag and nylon sleeve are very high quality. The zipper and seams are very well constructed. Nothing looks cheap about this bag. The stuffing seems to be just the right thickness, making for a comfortable sleep. We haven't tried this outdoors yet, but imagine that this would be warm enough to use outside on cool nights. The moose pattern is really cute too. Very glad I got this and I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lrusso

customer_reviews.title: He'll be taking it to scout camp soon for the 2nd year - he stays warm and comfortable in this
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves his moose sleeping bag. He'll be taking it to scout camp soon for the 2nd year - he stays warm and comfortable in this bag
customer_reviews.author: melinda

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at good price.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Good quality at a good price! Purchased a few. Used for overflow of grandkids and their cousins at vacation house. Also took camping. Kids even commented on moose print which is cute!
customer_reviews.author: Rportnana

customer_reviews.title: This is a good quality bag but the inside liner would have been ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her sleeping bag. This is a good quality bag but the inside liner would have been better if it were a bit of a warmer fabric. I should have gone with a fleece liner,
customer_reviews.author: amy west

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for kid sleepovers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my 7-year old son, and he has been using it for 3 years now and it is still in giod shape. It works well for sleepovers and warm-weather camping trips. It packs well into the stuff sack.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Great for slumber parties
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son's first slumber party. Did the job, come in his favorite color, has straps to hold it together, comfortable, and great price. My son absolutely enjoyed his sleeping bag and looks like he will get many uses out of it. I haven't used it for actual camping but looks comfortable to sleep in inside a tent. He slept on hardwood floors and did not complain.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Great summer bag.
customer_reviews.text: This is a completely adequate sleeping bag for kids. My daughter loves sleeping in it. That said, there's no way that I would allow them to sleep in this in 40-degree weather. This is a light summer bag, period. My critiques isn't that this isn't a nice sleeping bag for kids, but it shouldn't be marketed as appropriate for colder weather. All in all, we're very happy with this for summer camping.
customer_reviews.author: Pete O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sleeping by thinking it would be okay for my son to take it to kindergarten but it's too big my son is 55 in and he still has room in his sleeping bag but he will be using it for camping it's very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: shirley kwapong

customer_reviews.title: Zipper worked great (it was hard for my 3 yo niece to ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the pink sleeping bag for my niece and she loves it! The pattern is cute. Zipper worked great (it was hard for my 3 yo niece to zip it up by herself). The material is pretty slippery, but kept her warm throughout the night.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Very warm!! My daughter loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I went camping with her school at the end of Sept which was a very cold night. I was worried about her all night. I was freezing all night and my daughter didn't want to get out of this sleeping bag she was so warm. (I'm not a camper by nature). I'm so happy I got this for her! It was around 45 degrees that night if not colder. Even if it was colder out I now know not to worry!!
customer_reviews.author: Maizy86Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for a 5 year old's first sleepover
customer_reviews.text: I'm rating 4 stars for it being well built. The bag that it comes in pretty thin and when we tried to stuff it back in after being used, the tiny straps where the cord feeds through got ripped. Not a biggie, but annoying. My daughter disliked it and complained that it was too hot for her. The weather was about 50 degrees. I bought this in mind for letting her grow into it - thinking that perhaps buying a small size would be too thin and or too short, like a one-time-use deal. I would give it 5 stars if it rolled back up more compactly.
customer_reviews.author: boomerwang

customer_reviews.title: Nice sleeping bag for slumber parties!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and breathable sleeping bag. Bought this for a slumber party and it was easy to fold and unfold and very breathable.
customer_reviews.author: ALEXA W.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these, initially for sleepovers, but we've been using them for camping as well. We've had them for 2 years and they're still like-new. I've used it as well (i'm 5'3") when camping. It does well keeping you warm in 40ish degree weather. My only dislike of these sleeping bags is that as you're zipping it up, material gets caught in the zipper. Overall, would by again.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar MAready

customer_reviews.title: Worked wonderfully.
customer_reviews.text: Finally used this camping in cold weather and beyond thrilled. This has been mainly an indoor bag for us but last weekend we took it outside. We live in South Florida and it’s usually warm. Haha but this night it dropped to 42!!!!!! I was worried since my husband and I were freezing but our 7 yo son didn’t wake up once. I had also put a fleece in with him. Not sure if that’s made any difference. Anyhow it’s a great inexpensive cute bag.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S Sheaffer

customer_reviews.title: Great for summer camping or sleepovers but not for 40 degree temps outside
customer_reviews.text: The bags are very cute and our girls loved them! They seem well made and the price is nice. But....we went camping, in the real outdoors, and our girls were cold. The temps were in the upper 40s at night and they each had an extra blanket and were still too cold.
customer_reviews.author: lucybug04

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke after one night! Doesn't seem to well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Camille Jones

customer_reviews.title: Big and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Big and comfy bag for girls. It is pretty big packed and unpacked. Lots of fill. Kept my little one warm when temps were in the upper 40's. This was quite thicker than I'd expect from a 40 degree bag. Good for car camping or having sleepovers. Should last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Drvajeep

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves the moose motif - he’s four, it reminds him of visiting CO. Good quality material.
customer_reviews.author: crazy4bks

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe the cold requirements.
customer_reviews.text: Good for camping with temperatures higher than they say. We were sleeping in 50 degree weather and it didn’t keep kid warm. Middle of the night I switched with him so he could be warm and I forced myself in this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Maile Hemm

customer_reviews.title: I like it, as well as my daughter but it ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it, as well as my daughter but it is super slick and the zipper will not stay up. Bit concerning when camping.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter Loved!
customer_reviews.text: It's silky, but worked great for my granddaughter. Love the Moose print. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: igivetlc

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my great granddaughter for her 1st field trip with the Girl Scouts. She loved it. It says for boys but it was made for her.
customer_reviews.author: Windylee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality youth sleeping bag!!
customer_reviews.text: One kid received one as a gift and we liked it so well we got one for the other kid. Great for camping. It is a slippery material so we zip them together when the kids share a bed; otherwise one may slide right off! Typical sleeping bag material. Thick and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Alie; wife and mother

customer_reviews.title: Good for an in-home sleepover
customer_reviews.text: As expected light weight sleeping bag for kids. Appropriate for my 5 and 8 year old. Nothing too warm.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre A.

customer_reviews.title: Good, fun bag.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sleeping bag along with a "Coleman Kid Camo 45 Youth Sleeping Bag". They are both great bags, perfect for my 5 and 7 year old boys. I think they will last them a few years. They seem to be well made. One feature I liked about this bag is the elastic loops for securing the bag when rolled up. They are easier than the string ties on the Coleman.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice one
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made. My 6th grade son used this last week for science camp and he loved it
customer_reviews.author: Caesar

customer_reviews.title: Adorable design, lightweight and easy to pack away
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this sleeping bag. It adorable and light weight, more importantly it comes with a handy carrying/storage bag and has elastic on the bottom of the sleeping bag to keep the bag rolled up
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Songdahl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Your Little Princess Camper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she absolutely loves it. It didn't hold up that well in colder weather like we had hoped, but regardless, she thinks it is extremely comfortable and now uses it for her bed as well as when she goes camping. Which, I can say, it holds up to repeated washings very well. haha
customer_reviews.author: Beautiful Disaster

customer_reviews.title: My duaghter loves this bag!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really likes this bag. It's warm enough for her summer camping and the blue moose pattern is great for her. She struggles a little with stuffing it into the included stuff sack but it fits just fine. The size is a little big for her but since she grew out of her old kids sized bag, this one is perfect for her to keep growing in to. We are very happy with this purchase, the quality, and the value.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Cute sleeping bag!
customer_reviews.text: Looks really cute. Gift for grandson, think he will love it.
customer_reviews.author: OCEDGRAND

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it. But the outside fabric is noisy.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it. But the outside fabric is noisy. When we first got it our daughter wanted to do a sleep in our bedroom floor every time she moved in the night it was so noisy. Kept us up most of night. Don't know how it going to be when were all in a camp trailer or tent.
customer_reviews.author: Troy H.

customer_reviews.title: My son loved it..
customer_reviews.text: Went with my boy who is a boyscout and the temp outside was 40 it seemed to keep him warm and he actually seemed to sleep well. No issues but I only got to use it once. He liked the design of it as well. Now note I did have a heater for the tent but I didn't have it run all night.
customer_reviews.author: reddraco

customer_reviews.title: Cute and holds up.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after getting a character bag that fell apart the day we got it. This is an inexpensive sleeping bag that is durable from a reputable brand. (I’ve got one that’s 40 yrs old)
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Love the moose
customer_reviews.text: Great sleeping bag. Am just took son camping in 60 degree weather and there was plenty of warmth
customer_reviews.author: johnny

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: My son is 5 years old however pretty tall (but slim) for his age. I thought going with youth size bag would be acceptable...not in this case- he was pretty tight in it. The bag is also rated for 40 degrees - it started to get chilly at 50.
customer_reviews.author: Funky

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: These are great for camping. We bought two for our daughters and they are very well made & kept them very warm. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Camping or just staying o vernight
customer_reviews.text: The boys enjoyed these for a little while ..... but we ran out of summer temperatures & couldn't test them outside. They did enjoy them inside, however.
customer_reviews.author: rram242

customer_reviews.title: My kid did not like the material
customer_reviews.text: Too slippery and not comfortable. Material inside is the same as outside.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Linci

customer_reviews.title: Does not feel cheap and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! So far she’s only used it inside, so can not say how it sleeps outdoors. Very cute and nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a really, really cute sleeping bag. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really, really cute sleeping bag. We have a bunch of Coleman sleeping bags that now feature the zipper plow to stop the zipper from snagging on the fabric, so now I am wanting that feature on this one too! That is the only drawback. The quality is otherwise on par with the Coleman kids sleeping bags we have.
customer_reviews.author: angelinamax

customer_reviews.title: very warm
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2 yr old, it was in the 50's at night, she slept all through the night every night.... so obviously she was nice n toasty. The only thing to note is to make sure you follow the care instructions, it says to use in a front loader machine only.. my wife used our top loader to wash it b4 our trip, that caused a little clumping of the inside fibers, not bad just noticeable to me. Just follow the care instructions...
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new sleeping bag so much that we let her "camp out" in the living room with it a couple of nights. It seems well made, but it hasn't yet withstood the test of time and use. I docked a star now because the zipper does get caught. We got a blue one for my son and his zipper got stuck also.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This is my third purchase of this bag, very happy with it. Great birthday present for my grandsons 3,4,5 yrs. the 1 year old would get lost in it presently. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Marian Wellman-Horton

customer_reviews.title: I love the print of the bag and my 2 year ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the print of the bag and my 2 year old was bundled in this sleeping bag while camping. he was kept VERY warm. he loves laying around in his sleeping bag at the house as well. would definitely recommend! He has plenty of room to grow into this as well! we'll be able to use it for many years.
customer_reviews.author: SKM724

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it. Storage sack is flimsy, so be careful when putting it away. Luckily the sleeping bag itself has two straps at the bottom to hold the rolled up bag when you're done, so the sack isn't strictly necessary and not worth docking a star.
customer_reviews.author: M. Elam

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves pink so this should be something she will enjoy for a long time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Christmas present. My granddaughter loves pink so this should be something she will enjoy for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Ann Byxbe

customer_reviews.title: Did not survive first wash prior to use
customer_reviews.text: I washed this sleeping as directed prior to it’s first use and the zipper was ruined & came away from the sleeping bag, rendering it unusable. I am completely disappointed in this product. We have the same sleeping bag for our son but it was purchased 5 years ago & clearly the quality has decreased since them.
customer_reviews.author: David Gordon

customer_reviews.title: The color is nice and both of my kids love theirs sleeping bags
customer_reviews.text: The colors are nice and both of my kids love theirs sleeping bags. It is very thick but I don't like the fact that It's impossible to fold it back so it fits in the bag. Also, one of the seams broke the first time we used it so it's good we had sawing kit handy.
customer_reviews.author: Mag

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sleeping bag about a year ago for my 6 yr old and just bought another for my 4 yr old. I think its a great sleeping bag and will last for years. It fits now and will fit them for many years. We have used it for camping as well as for sleep overs. It is tough to get back in the bag when rolled up. We have found it easier to just stuff it in the bag without rolling it up.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: lightweight but warm sleeping bag!
customer_reviews.text: Bought five of these--three blue, two pink. My grands loved them and have used them on several occasions. In the winter, they bundle up in them just to watch TV. A great Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Roberson

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves her moose sleeping bag! It's very ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her moose sleeping bag! It's very thick and well made. It's also almost impossible to get it back in the storage bag. That's how thick it is. It's bigger than I thought it would be. She's 5 now but I bet this bag will last her several years.
customer_reviews.author: GAmom33

customer_reviews.title: Great child’s sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect lightweight sleeping bag for our young grand daughter. Fabric is soft and pattern/colors are the same as in photo.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Merrick

customer_reviews.title: My 7 year old loves this sleeping bag.
customer_reviews.text: It's very warm and well made. It is much bigger than the toddler size. I am 5'4" and fit in just fine. I will not even attempt to get it back in the bag it came in. It does have stretch straps attached to it. The straps keep the bag in place when rolled up. I think the straps are a pin but usable. The design is really cute and my daughter was thrilled. She slept in it on to pot her bed. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoor use
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t recommend this for actual camping if you’re in the pnw like I am but my daughter uses it for sleepovers and “camping” in her teepee inside and it’s comfy and great for that. Has held up to plenty of washing at this point
customer_reviews.author: Micaela Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeping Bag for School Aged Kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2.5 year old son and it is WAY to long for him an he will only sleep with it unzipped, but he will eventually grow into it and it is very warm and getting the sleeping bag in the bag is a snap! Perfect sleeping bag to bring on a camping trip or sleep over. I would guess a 6-12 year old would be more of the age to use this bag. It is too small for an adult but to big for a preschooler.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.I

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, my son loved it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 8 year old son. He said he was very cozy in in and slept very well.
customer_reviews.author: tamn

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeping bag for sleepovers!
customer_reviews.text: The boys love it! Nice sturdy zipper, washes well, comfortable. We bought it for sleepovers so not sure how it would perform on a camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Good for summer
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm really happy with this sleeping bag for my kids. It was perfect for our summer camping trip and they love it. But WHY does it have to say "boy's" right on the packaging for the blue one!? My girls both love the blue. Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeping bags for the grandkids
customer_reviews.text: Great sleeping bags for the grandkids, they love them. Weve been camping in the back yard. They are soft, perfect weight for summer and fall. with the blue and pink colors theres no fighting and they like have their own different colors. Easy to roll up and fit back in the bag. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these for my 3 girls. They kept them warm and they appear well made.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: This is an adorable sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable sleeping bag. I wish it was a little warmer. I'm not sure I would mark it as a 40 degree bag. My son loves it but when it gets cold at night camping he often crawls into my husband or my sleeping bag with us.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a young child, and great quality! This is a REAL sleeping bag, not a thin toy like most children’s sleeping bags are. I’m very satisfied with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Westmoreland

customer_reviews.title: super soft material and kept my daughter warm
customer_reviews.text: super soft material and kept my daughter warm. She did slip and slide since the outside is a slippery material but she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson hurst

customer_reviews.title: A favorite
customer_reviews.text: Worked pretty well - my 3yo daughter loves it and it kept her warm down into the 40's with the addition of another blanket. It's a little long now, but hopefully it will last for a bit.
customer_reviews.author: JDC

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I did not personally use but my kids loved them so much while camping they now use in there beds at home
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Beaulieu

customer_reviews.title: Daughter preferred over Tempu-Pedic Bed?!?
customer_reviews.text: Daughter has used this sleeping bag on many occasions and has enjoyed it so much that she sometimes ask to sleep on it instead of Tempur-Pedic bed. Silly child. That does speak of how plush this sleeping bag feels and I'm confident it will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: jclay81

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in 2016. Only used it a couple of times. The zipper broke on the 2nd use. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: and it is just perfect! He mostly "camps out" in the house right ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sleeping bag for my 3 year old grandson, and it is just perfect! He mostly "camps out" in the house right now, but has used it a time or two outside, andit has keep him cozy through the night. Good quality, and a cute design perfect for young boys ( or moose-loving girls!). Would definitely recommend this based on our experience so far.
customer_reviews.author: Iowa girl

product_meta.title: Wenzel Moose Youth 40-Degree Sleeping Bag
product_meta.description: Wenzel Moose 40 Degree Sleeping Bag - Pink
feature_bullets: LET’S GO CAMPING: With a fun and colorful Moose pattern, this 40-degree sleeping bag will help get any child in the camping spirit. Quilt through construction with Insul-Therm fill will keep kids warm and cozy, and the bag unzips to convert to a blanket.

FEATURES: Self-repairing 2-way main zipper offers versatile ventilation; fully unzips and converts to blanket; breathable fabric maintains comfort through the night; soft polyester insulation locks in warmth
SPECS: Size: 66 inches by 26 inches, Weight: 3 lb 2 oz, Material: 190T Poly Taffeta, Fill: Soft polyester insulation
INCLUDED: Stuff sack for easy packing and transport

WARRANTY: 10 Year Limited – Wenzel warrants to the original purchaser that its products will be free from defects in materials or workmanship for 10 years from the original retail purchase date. Contact our Customer Service team for prompt service.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
